mapper.insert:
insert into work_task_record
work_task_record.task_id, work_task_record.worker_id, work_task_record.task_main_config_id, work_task_record.page_downloaded, work_task_record.download_sucess, work_task_record.success, work_task_record.exit_code,
work_task_record.start_time,
work_task_record.end_time
values
#{taskId}, #{workerId}, #{taskMainConfigId}, #{pageDownloaded}, #{downloadSucess}, #{success}, #{exitCode},
#{startTime},
#{endTime}
mapper.update:
update work_task_record
work_task_record.task_id = #{TaskId},
work_task_record.worker_id = #{WorkerId},
work_task_record.task_main_config_id = #{TaskMainConfigId},
work_task_record.page_downloaded = #{PageDownloaded},
work_task_record.download_sucess = #{DownloadSucess},
work_task_record.success = #{Success},
work_task_record.exit_code = #{ExitCode},
work_task_record.start_time = #{StartTime},
work_task_record.end_time = #{EndTime}
work_task_record.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select work_task_record.id, work_task_record.task_id, work_task_record.worker_id, work_task_record.task_main_config_id, work_task_record.page_downloaded, work_task_record.download_sucess, work_task_record.success, work_task_record.exit_code, work_task_record.start_time, work_task_record.end_time form work_task_record
